context.p: Install the Eucalyptus-prepared dependency RPMs on all machines, both front-end and node machines.
context.note: Remove any preexisting copies of these dependencies before you install. The install process returns an error message if it finds multiple copies of a dependency.

step.cmd: In the terminal window, type the following commands:

info.codeblock: [root@clc]# cd eucalyptus-deps* [root@clc]# yum install -y *.rpm --nogpgcheck [root@node1]# cd eucalyptus-deps* [root@node1]# yum install -y *.rpm --nogpgcheck
